TopicTitle: What mods would make the perfect future "Stock"-KSP for you?

Articles.Content:
I'm just curious.

The game is awsome, but there are always some things everyone would like to add.

So I just wanted to know wich mods do you install and call it -unofficially- Stock for yourself?

Let's keep this simple here is my "Stock" list:

Fixes:

  • StockBugFixModules
  • StockPlus
  • TemperatureGaugeKiller (Only because of the memoryleak)

Tools:

  • KerbalEngineerRedux
  • KerbalAlarmClock
  • TransferWindowPlanner
  • RCSBuildAid
  • PreciseNode
  • NavballDockingIndicator

Contracts and stuff related to those:

  • ContractConfigurator
  • ContractConfigurator-AnomalySurveyor
  • ContractConfigurator-Tourism
  • ContractConfigurator-FieldResearch
  • ContractConfigurator-UsefulSpaceStations
  • ContractConfigurator-HistoricMissions
  • WiderContractsApp
  • WaypointManager
  • CoherentContracts

Science!:

  • ScienceAlert
  • DMagicOrbitalScience
  • CrowdsourcedScience

Some gameplay:

  • OpenTree
  • FogOfTech
  • TestFlight
  • TestFlightConfigStock
Mech Jeb SmartA.S.S. and data, plus maneuver executer, I would want everything on your list integrated into the stock game besides historic missions and DMagic Orbital Science

Mech Jeb SmartA.S.S. and data

, E.V.E., B9 Procedural Wings, Distant Object, Trajectories, Strip Symmetry, SCANsat, Smart Stage (this one's really good, saves lot of time).

Procedural wings (the B9 ones preferably), Kerbal Flight Data, and while I don't use it anymore (mainly because I forget about it, right up until I try to dock) the docking camera.

Some form of KAS would be nice too, not the full shebang with winches and everything, just the ability to link to another vessel without docking.
Not sure if this is a mod but something to be able to customize what are inside tanks(anything LF only, 50%monoprop and 50% LF, all Xeon). Atomic age too for higher ISP

@mrlucks i think InterstellarFuelSwitch does something like that.

Oh totally forgott about smartstage, since im playing with the OpenTree right now and decided to to some unmanned stuff this would come in handy.

I dont like Mechjeb, and i also played with the procedural parts stuff once it was nice but b9 got updated too late so i decided to kick all that out. But your right those wings are pretty nice to have.

Not sure if this is a mod but something to be able to customize what are inside tanks(anything LF only, 50%monoprop and 50% LF, all Xeon). Atomic age too for higher ISP

You could try Modular Fuel Tanks...

Stock Bug Fixes, Kerbal Engineer, Waypoint manager and Ambient Light Adjustment. (The last one more for my videos than myself, but still)

Also: Environmental Visual Enhancements.

KAC

KAS

KIS

EVE

NFC

NFS

KER

PWings

NFC/NFS NearFuture-Something?
Pretty much the entirety of RO/RSS plus a few extras.
For me there's only KER, Kerbal Flight Data, SimpleScienceFix, PortraitStats, ScienceAlert and QuickScroll
@malah: And now making this thred payed off! That SimpleScienceFix sure looks verry handy, thanks:D
